title: Old style - O'Bradys
content:
Is their a digital version of this font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [obradys.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060523005057/http:/typophile.com/files/obradys.jpg) | 27.79 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: No, that looks hand drawn. But it’s very close to [Blackmoor](http://web.archive.org/web/20060523005057/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.6584.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BEEF%27O%27BRADY%27S&sampleSize=39) and maybe you’ll dig [Gargoyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20060523005057/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=DF.104975.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=CHICKEN+O%27TOOLE&sampleSize=60).
